story:
Security Television Network (STN) specializes in “breaking stories about victims, criminals, justice, security business and financial market news.” STN is the world's first television channel to provide 24-hour security news coverage -- poised to shape the future of security communication.

Before I share more about the channel, it’s fair that you should know something about who is bringing this Indiegogo campaign to you for support.  Here is a fact, we’re ready to deliver to you a service that I believe every informed citizen needs, and should become familiar with our start-up, the worlds first 24-hour security news channel. 

Our great country is being challenged by those who choose to divide us by race, political ideology, and the right of a collective people to feel secure. 

The second paragraph of the United States Declaration of Independence, however, lets us know and we shall remember that: "We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal, and that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights, and that among these are Life, Liberty and the Pursuit of Happiness.  While these words and ideals are enshrined in our collective culture as Americans, we’re blitzed by sensational and exploitative soundbite news, the nationalization of media, thousands of news outlets with varying levels of quality and integrity, and what appears to remain are ideological debates, which fail to embrace the promise of a shared destiny.   While I’m hopeful, it’s clear our common stories that unite and connect us as people, are under siege.

America, is where I was born and raised.  I grew-up living on the fence line of a strawberry farm in Norwich, CT.  Life quickly changed, however, when my mother, a single mom of five children, became one of the first women welders at General Dynamics, working night shifts in subzero temperatures to weld the hull of a “Trident” nuclear submarine. Since this time, I became well aware of what it would take to keep a country safe, and how the creation of might can be a deterrent to war, not invite war.  The Big Stick Ideology by, President Theodore Roosevelt’s foreign policy: "speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far."

STN news coverage will include:

Gun Violence Epidemic, Full disclosure, the founder of STN, Dr. James Hall, joined the NRA before he became a teenager, raised on the belief that owning a gun is an American value. He grew up hunting and fishing but no longer has an interest in shooting animals.  Today, his values of safety and gun ownership are challenged by gun violence, which is a public health epidemic. Many innocent people died as a result of firearm injuries every year in the United States, while so many others are wounded. How do we balance these competing values of safe gun ownership and the gun violence epidemic?  It’s time to move past single events, dig deeper into the root cause(s) of this epidemic, and deliver the long-form news to allow for real-change.  In fact, 39,707 Americans died from gun violence in 2019. This equates to over 3,300 gun deaths each month, over 763 gun deaths a week, and nearly 109 people killed with guns every day. The numbers are staggering, and we must never forget that behind them are very real stories of people with stories of their own.  Individuals who are no longer with us because of a preventable tragedy.

Domestic terrorism, Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups to further ideological goals stemming from domestic influences, such as those of a political, religious, social, racial, or environmental nature.

International terrorism,﻿ Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups who are inspired by, or associated with, designated foreign terrorist organizations or nations (state-sponsored).

Cybersecurity, the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks. These cyberattacks are usually aimed at assessing, modifying, or destroying sensitive information; Ransomware: extorting money from users; or interrupting normal business processes.

Consumer privacy, which involves the handling and protection of sensitive personal information provided by customers in the course of everyday transactions.

Global health security, how strong and resilient is our public health system, which should be able to prevent, detect, and respond to infectious disease threats, wherever they occur in the world? 

Election security, the heart of our democracy is the protection of elections and the voting infrastructure, keeping it safe from cyberattack or cyber threat – including the tampering with or infiltration of voting machines and equipment, election office networks and practices, and voter registration databases. Election security also includes voter suppression and the efforts to erase voting rights for millions of people, which has escalated across the country.

Community policing, or community-oriented policing (COP), a strategy of policing that focuses on developing relationships with community members. The central goal of community policing is for police to build relationships with the community, including through local agencies to reduce social disorder.  STN coverage news coverage will also include Police misconduct, referring to inappropriate conduct and illegal actions taken by police officers in connection with their official duties, and America’s commitment to justice.

National security, the security and defense of the United States, including its citizens, economy, and institutions, which is regarded as a duty of government. This includes defense, arms control, nuclear proliferation, military families, space force, immigration & border security, among other aspects of protection.

Diplomacy or International Relations, the practice of influencing the decisions and conduct of foreign governments or intergovernmental organizations through discussion, negotiation, and other nonviolent more thoughtful means.

Global action on Global Threats, the global challenges facing the United States—from climate change and mass migration to technological disruption and infectious diseases—have grown more complex and more urgent, while the rapid advance of authoritarianism, nationalism, and illiberalism has undermined our ability to collectively meet them. 

Violence against women (VAW), also known as gender-based violence and sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV), which are violent acts primarily or exclusively committed against women or girls. Such violence is often considered a form of hate crime, committed against women or girls specifically because they are female.

Hate Crimes, a traditional offense like murder, arson, or vandalism with an added element of bias. For the purposes of collecting statistics, the FBI has defined a hate crime as a “criminal offense against a person or property motivated in whole or in part by an offender’s bias against a race, religion, disability, sexual orientation, ethnicity, gender, or gender identity.” Hate itself is not a crime—and the FBI is mindful of protecting freedom of speech and other civil liberties.

Drug-related crime, possession, manufacture, or distribution of drugs among so many other topics of concern to citizens. It’s time to re-balance these citizen concerns with long-form investigative journalism – giving stories the air time they deserve!

What We Need

Round A Funding Requirement: $640,400

 

   PLEASE HELP US REACH OUR GOAL OF $640,400

 

Our Budget:

$21,600 : CNN VAN multi-year license

$18,000 : SOCIALIVE multi-year software license

$116,000: Website Development

$124,800: Personnel Salaries

$360,000: STN Studio

========

$640,400 Total

 

PARTNERS

CNN VAN multi-year license

Apart from establishing our own in-house journalism staff, STN has a significant partnering opportunity with CNN.

VIDEO AFFILIATE NETWORK (VAN)

STN was invited to partner with CNN, the world’s digital news video leader, in a reciprocal agreement and join its one-stop digital video syndication platform that is built with newsrooms and digital news publishers in mind. The platform leads with what’s most important to its partners: great content by trusted news publishers.  CNN Newsource’s Video Affiliate Network (VAN) is a powerful digital video syndication network focused exclusively on quality news and lifestyle video from CNN and its trusted affiliates. The CNN advantage for STN is enormous as we have an opportunity to combine our in-house journalism efforts with CNNs unparalleled footprint.  

With access to the largest news gathering footprint in the market, CNN has 1,000+ news partners across broadcast, radio, newspaper and digital. Their regional news gathering team brings in more regional news than any other network, often by 3 or 4 times. With 36 domestic and international editorial operations, CNN Newsource is the industry’s most powerful newsgathering resource and North America’s most widely-distributed syndicated news service.

CNN Newsource will enable STN to specifically select and focus on their security niche content as a supplement to our own journalism and broadcasting staff.  With 24-hour digital distribution and eleven live digital satellite channels to create a compelling STN Newscast, collaborate on stories as they develop, and gather news that matters to our collective audience.  This afford STN premium reach on its platform, while profiting from its advertising revenue share model, powerful video content, and flexible technology.

HOW IT WORKS

CNN Newsource Digital, an affordable, end-to-end solution built for digital news publishers. CNN Newsource curates content from CNN, local affiliates and select content partners. CNN Newsource sells advertising against this video inventory and shares revenue with participating affiliates. The more VAN video published, the more revenue earned. 

VAN is available exclusively for CNN Newsource affiliates and select distribution partners. VAN video is continuously updated and curated with content that cover the big stories each day across news, lifestyle and entertainment. VAN affiliates generate revenue by publishing VAN video across their website (pre-sold by CNN Newsource) as well as distributing their own video content through the VAN platform. VAN’s flexible video player and technology platform offers a variety of options for publishing, distribution and content management. Affiliates also have access to Newsource expertise on best practices for optimal performance and monetization.

As this opportunity relates to security business news, and financial market coverage, STN can provide niche programming coverage to an industry long overdue.  As an example, the market size of the security services industry alone in the United States has increased steadily since 2011, reaching a value of approximately 49.2 billion U.S. dollars in 2020. Despite the economic effects of the coronavirus (COVID-19), the industry is expected to continually increase by 0.2 percent in 2021 (Published by Statista Research Department, Mar 30, 2021).  On a global scale, the cyber security market size was valued at USD 156.5 billion in 2019 and is expected to expand at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.0% from 2020 to 2027(Grand View Research).  

While growth is significant, the market, however, is becoming saturated, raising  marketability concerns, which drive increasing cost in marketing campaigns.  We, however, see this as a significant opportunity to provide visibility to important business stories, as the security industry is constantly evolving with new and evolving threats, technology, and business opportunities.  STN will aggregate, deliver, and produce the business stories that are so important to today’s citizens, while earning/sharing revenue.

SOCIALIVE multi-year software license

Video Production Requires Time, Money, and Expertise

Socialive makes it refreshingly easy to capture, create, and distribute video across multiple platforms — giving every team the power to connect more authentically with customers and employees. 

Socialive simplifies video content creation, and  because the case studies confirm the cost savings to produce video, STN is also going to take advantage of these cost savings.  Below is an example of how POLITICO saved money and time in its video production.

Staying On Top Of A Fast-Paced News Cycle

To harness the power of the newsroom and equip its audience with impactful information, POLITICO transitioned from live to virtual events. The Events team looked for a video creation platform to help them keep up with a dizzying news cycle. In search of a flexible solution tailored to their video needs, they encountered several problems:

High video production time, cost, and complexity

Inability to integrate with POLITICO’s product and teams

Low production value

Lack of customization

In addition to figuring out how to efficiently package and distribute video content, the team simplified their end-to-end video workflow and scaled video creation with its existing resources. In an era of social distancing, it was also key to land on a solution built for team collaboration.

Best practices, feedback, quality control.  STN journalist would be enabled to capture video in the field, and it appears instantly in a central library for review, refinement, and sharing out.

 

FUTURE API INTEGRATION

Website Development

The STN website Beta is now complete.  With the exceptional growth in the telecommunication sector, news is shared almost instantly, a capability that STN must share. The news website for the current generation requires more features than just posting and sharing the news.

Ongoing website development will give it the technological freedom to rapidly speed up the process of integrating it with an open application programming interface (API), connecting between other computers or between computer programs. It is a type of software interface, offering a service to other pieces of software.  STN will use them for everything, from niche topics to creating the next big general news platform, and connecting its platform to partner networks like Socialive, cVent for webinars, and Wistia to launch STN Radio.

Personnel Salaries

The hiring process begins by identifying a need within your organization. STN has identified the following needs for its organization: 

(1) Virtual Assistant (Part-time) - A virtual assistant is generally self-employed and provides professional administrative, technical, or creative assistance to clients remotely from a home office.

(1) Digital Media Manager (Full-Time) - A digital marketing manager is responsible for developing, implementing and managing marketing campaigns that promote a company and its products and/or services. He or she plays a major role in enhancing brand awareness within the digital space as well as driving website traffic and acquiring leads/customers.

(2) Journalist  (Part-Time) - An individual trained to collect/gather information in form of text, audio or pictures, processes them to a news-worth form and disseminates it to the public.

(1) TV/Radio Broadcasters (Part-Time) - Broadcast journalists research, investigate and present news and current affairs content for television, radio and the internet.

PRODUCTION

STN Studio

Building an in-house video studio can be a very expensive endeavor.  While the evidence is clear that a virtual in-home studio did work initially for the STN Beta, it's no longer sustainable as a primary production studio.  Additionally, while renting studio time is a short-term solution, our long-term goal serves the growth and talent advantage of the employment base in Arizona.  Maricopa County is in the Phoenix metropolitan area. The area boasts major employers such as Axon, Norton Lifelock, Amazon, KPMG, Securitas, the City of Phoenix, and several financial companies including American Express, Bank of America and Wells Fargo.

It's home to the Center of the Future of War at Arizona State University, Johnson Controls, and  several local businesses ranging from mom-and-pop country stores to well-known national retailers, giving the city a true Hometown, USA feel. This is especially important for STN as it will strive to become a part of the employment base of opportunities in the Phoenix metro, which has a population of nearly five million people.

In these conditions, its clear to us that the hassle of scheduling a shoot, booking a studio, and traveling to the location was a short-term solution.  STN goal is to own its on-site studio, meaning no setup and teardown time; the space is always ready to use at our convenience. This provides great peace of mind for executives, who often have to go live at a moment’s notice. For the marketing team, this provides a whole new level of creative control.

STN will use a  dedicated video studio to interview executives, broadcast news and radio, stream product demos, webinars, employee addresses, and much more.

While STN specializes in “breaking stories about victims, criminals, justice, security business and financial market news.”  Its content will be in the form of documentaries, specials, security tradeshows, webinars, and RealityTV, Court TV Cases, among other types of productions.  STN currently partners with multiple producers and security related production houses for content and we aim to increase these partnerships, while producing STN content in-house.  Below is an example of our current library.

HAK_MTL - Trailer

SOLDIER's Kiss: A PTSD Documentary - Trailer

DIGITAL DISSIDENTS - Trailer

THE PERFECT VICTIM - Trailer

PEKKA - Trailer

DATALAND - Trailer
PRISON DOGS - Trailer

BLACK AND BLUE

WHAT WE TOLD OUR SONS

BLUDGEON - Trailer

THE COLOR OF YOUR SKIN - Trailer

A MATTER OF BIAS - Trailer

THE ORDINANCE - Trailer

FROM WAR TO WISDOM

 
If STN does not reach its entire budget goal, we will prioritize what funds we receive in the following order.  We would first solidify the CNN VAN partnership, and license the SOCIALIVE software to allow for the production of in-house news.  Thereafter, we would deliver on website development at a slower pace, continuing to plow all profits back into the company for maximum growth.

 

Our Budget:

Priority #1 $21,600 : CNN VAN multi-year license

Priority #2 $18,000 : SOCIALIVE multi-year software license

Priority #3 $116,000: Website Development

Priority #4 $124,800: Personnel Salaries

Priority #5 $360,000: STN Studio

The Impact of Your Support

Your support is critical to fuel our continued existence and growth strategy.

Apart from strategic use of social media as a growth strategy, partnering with platforms like CNN, and the global distribution of news stories that matter, your customer experience is our #1 growth mechanism, and it will be the primary reason for our success.  STN understands the power entrusted with the freedom of the press, and it’s this principle of communication and expression, which should be considered a right to be exercised freely.  At the same time, freedom of the press comes with substantial responsibility.

When peeling back the layers of this responsibility, as we do with each investigative story, getting to the core of a story is what readers seek. Readers want reporters to go beyond the basic elements of the story. STN will regularly take a  critical look at its reporting and make sure it attempts to fully explore all aspects of the story. This might include explaining background information, providing context beyond the facts of the latest update, and taking an investigative approach whenever possible.

STN will address terminology, particularly as it relates to new issues and concerns like cybersecurity, artificial intelligence among so many other newer Internet related Technology fields, which thoroughly require taking a step back and thinking about whether the average reader would have a full understanding of all the terms in a story. This not only applies to journalistic terms and procedures that are part of your everyday vocabulary, but not entirely familiar to your entire audience, but also extends to the industries discussed in your story. To help with this concern, STN will consider breaking down a story into its detail, utilizing more long-form vs soundbite news delivery, accounting for the processes and procedures associated with the story in addition to avoiding industry jargon.

Because readers don’t have an inside look at STNs reporting process, it's unclear to them why STN ended up with certain interviews and not others, who declined to speak, or who did not answer your request for an interview. This is part of a more significant issue where readers often associate this with a perceived imbalance in the reporting. STN will include a variety of voices in the story and/or balance stories with opposing counter stories, perhaps more importantly, to explain why certain voices were chosen and why others were left out or unavailable.

Furthermore, there are so many questions about bias centered on the journalists’ motivations, possible affiliation with the subject of the story, among other overall angles. One way STN will guard against perceived bias is to provide a statement of independence that makes it clear that STN and/or its journalist has no relationship with story sources. STN will also clarify key information about how and why the story was reported. The bottom line, STN Readers will always have questions and there are countless ways STN will go about addressing these concerns. However, as the founder of STN, Dr. James Hall’s mission is that each STN journalist considers Edward R. Murrow in this regard, an American broadcast journalist and war correspondent who gained prominence during World War II.  He delivered live radio broadcasts from Europe for the news division of CBS, and was considered one of journalism’s greatest figures, noting his honesty and integrity in delivering the news.

Risks & Challenges

There are multiple obstacles STN will face on the way to achieving its goals:

  • In 2019, the failure rate of startups was around 90%.  Research concludes 21.5% of startups fail in the first year, 30% in the second year, 50% in the fifth year, and 70% in their 10th year.
  • According to business owners, reasons for failure include money running out, being in the wrong market, a lack of research, bad partnerships, ineffective marketing, and not being an expert in the industry.
  • The ways to avoid failing include setting goals, accurate research, loving the work, and not quitting.

Please know this about the founder and CEO of STN, if I don't have the answer I will find out who does.  I will surround myself with people who are a hell of a-lot smarter than myself, and work tirelessly to provide the best quality of news available.

 

I'm a military veteran, leader and founder of emerging video platform, the Security Television Network (STN), which excels at digital media, social media, marketing campaigns, operations, leadership, managing technical teams, working closely with internal/external stakeholders, video, its storage, and distribution.  Both strategic and tactical, Dr. James Hall has a strong focus on delivering results, and leading a group into “click, follow, and engagement infamy.”

 

“Let's Do Big Things together, please join STN…?

 

Dr. James Hall's biography includes some of the following:

  • National bioterrorism Safety & security expert for the FBI.
  • FBI national infrastructure protection liaison after 911, supported development of high value assets database and understand threat management.
  • Managed and conducted domestic industrial IT/Physical security assessments (penetration testing, badging, defining and valuing assets, etc.) for strategic intermodal states of national economic significance (Hoover Dam, Nations Oil Reserves, San Onofre Nuclear Facility, Port of San Diego).
  • Managed and conducted international Counter Terrorism/Piracy efforts to protect American Interests as it relates to maritime ports across the globe, and the cruise ship industry.
  • Originally chartered by Congress as the Homeland Security Institute (HSI), served with ANSER team that developed the Department of Homeland Security.
  • United Nations adopted the U.S. Coast Guards initial submission of the International Maritime Security Code, which addressed maritime security regulations for conducting Port Security Assessments on a global scale. The new standard became the 21st Century approach to securing maritime borders. I authored it during assignment in Washington, DC, shortly after 911, to support U.S. effort to be 1st in maritime security.  Titled, Facility Security Assessment. Safety of Life at Sea (SOLAS) Chapter XI, Part B:15 (2001), known as ISPS Code.
  • Developed initial version of USCG Incident Management Handbook (2001).
  • Boeing Joint Program Instructor for Incident Investigations and Safety Leadership.

Dr. James Hall

Our business advantages are only as strong as our news content. Aside from ensuring the STN team is poised to conduct quality investigative journalism, STN will provide quality educational entertainment, which will aim to grow its audience globally via international news bureaus, and work diligently to encapsulate an ethical mission to provide well-researched, fact based news, while capitalizing on the following:

  • CNN Video Affiliate Network
  • Large audience: Billions of people are impacted by Security daily
  • Highly targeted ads by advertisers and sponsors
  • Social Media: Our social media posts will be interactive for viewers, increasing engagement
  • Advertisers and Sponsors can use STN’s social media platform to speak directly to consumers in real time.
  • Large amounts of performance evaluation data available: Advertisers can use a number of programs to monitor, track and report on social media ad performance.

STN Journalist Team

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

  • Share on social media platforms and websites to anyone that you think would be interested!

  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Security Television Network (STN) specializes in “breaking stories about victims, criminals, justice, security business and financial market news.” STN is the world's first television channel to provide 24-hour security news coverage -- poised to shape the future of security communication.
Before I share more about the channel, it’s fair that you should know something about who is bringing this Indiegogo campaign to you for support.  Here is a fact, we’re ready to deliver to you a service that I believe every informed citizen needs, and should become familiar with our start-up, the worlds first 24-hour security news channel. 
Our great country is being challenged by those who choose to divide us by race, political ideology, and the right of a collective people to feel secure. 
The second paragraph of the United States Declaration of Independence, however, lets us know and we shall remember that: "We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal, and that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights, and that among these are Life, Liberty and the Pursuit of Happiness.  While these words and ideals are enshrined in our collective culture as Americans, we’re blitzed by sensational and exploitative soundbite news, the nationalization of media, thousands of news outlets with varying levels of quality and integrity, and what appears to remain are ideological debates, which fail to embrace the promise of a shared destiny.   While I’m hopeful, it’s clear our common stories that unite and connect us as people, are under siege.
America, is where I was born and raised.  I grew-up living on the fence line of a strawberry farm in Norwich, CT.  Life quickly changed, however, when my mother, a single mom of five children, became one of the first women welders at General Dynamics, working night shifts in subzero temperatures to weld the hull of a “Trident” nuclear submarine. Since this time, I became well aware of what it would take to keep a country safe, and how the creation of might can be a deterrent to war, not invite war.  The Big Stick Ideology by, President Theodore Roosevelt’s foreign policy: "speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far."
STN news coverage will include:
Gun Violence Epidemic, Full disclosure, the founder of STN, Dr. James Hall, joined the NRA before he became a teenager, raised on the belief that owning a gun is an American value. He grew up hunting and fishing but no longer has an interest in shooting animals.  Today, his values of safety and gun ownership are challenged by gun violence, which is a public health epidemic. Many innocent people died as a result of firearm injuries every year in the United States, while so many others are wounded. How do we balance these competing values of safe gun ownership and the gun violence epidemic?  It’s time to move past single events, dig deeper into the root cause(s) of this epidemic, and deliver the long-form news to allow for real-change.  In fact, 39,707 Americans died from gun violence in 2019. This equates to over 3,300 gun deaths each month, over 763 gun deaths a week, and nearly 109 people killed with guns every day. The numbers are staggering, and we must never forget that behind them are very real stories of people with stories of their own.  Individuals who are no longer with us because of a preventable tragedy.
Domestic terrorism, Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups to further ideological goals stemming from domestic influences, such as those of a political, religious, social, racial, or environmental nature.
International terrorism,﻿ Violent, criminal acts committed by individuals and/or groups who are inspired by, or associated with, designated foreign terrorist organizations or nations (state-sponsored).
Cybersecurity, the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks. These cyberattacks are usually aimed at assessing, modifying, or destroying sensitive information; Ransomware: extorting money from users; or interrupting normal business processes.
Consumer privacy, which involves the handling and protection of sensitive personal information provided by customers in the course of everyday transactions.
Global health security, how strong and resilient is our public health system, which should be able to prevent, detect, and respond to infectious disease threats, wherever they occur in the world? 
Election security, the heart of our democracy is the protection of elections and the voting infrastructure, keeping it safe from cyberattack or cyber threat – including the tampering with or infiltration of voting machines and equipment, election office networks and practices, and voter registration databases. Election security also includes voter suppression and the efforts to erase voting rights for millions of people, which has escalated across the country.
Community policing, or community-oriented policing (COP), a strategy of policing that focuses on developing relationships with community members. The central goal of community policing is for police to build relationships with the community, including through local agencies to reduce social disorder.  STN coverage news coverage will also include Police misconduct, referring to inappropriate conduct and illegal actions taken by police officers in connection with their official duties, and America’s commitment to justice.
National security, the security and defense of the United States, including its citizens, economy, and institutions, which is regarded as a duty of government. This includes defense, arms control, nuclear proliferation, military families, space force, immigration & border security, among other aspects of protection.
Diplomacy or International Relations, the practice of influencing the decisions and conduct of foreign governments or intergovernmental organizations through discussion, negotiation, and other nonviolent more thoughtful means.
Global action on Global Threats, the global challenges facing the United States—from climate change and mass migration to technological disruption and infectious diseases—have grown more complex and more urgent, while the rapid advance of authoritarianism, nationalism, and illiberalism has undermined our ability to collectively meet them. 
Violence against women (VAW), also known as gender-based violence and sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV), which are violent acts primarily or exclusively committed against women or girls. Such violence is often considered a form of hate crime, committed against women or girls specifically because they are female.
Hate Crimes, a traditional offense like murder, arson, or vandalism with an added element of bias. For the purposes of collecting statistics, the FBI has defined a hate crime as a “criminal offense against a person or property motivated in whole or in part by an offender’s bias against a race, religion, disability, sexual orientation, ethnicity, gender, or gender identity.” Hate itself is not a crime—and the FBI is mindful of protecting freedom of speech and other civil liberties.
Drug-related crime, possession, manufacture, or distribution of drugs among so many other topics of concern to citizens. It’s time to re-balance these citizen concerns with long-form investigative journalism – giving stories the air time they deserve!

What We Need
Round A Funding Requirement: $640,400
 
   PLEASE HELP US REACH OUR GOAL OF $640,400
 
Our Budget:
$21,600 : CNN VAN multi-year license
$18,000 : SOCIALIVE multi-year software license
$116,000: Website Development
$124,800: Personnel Salaries
$360,000: STN Studio
========
$640,400 Total
 
PARTNERS
CNN VAN multi-year license

Apart from establishing our own in-house journalism staff, STN has a significant partnering opportunity with CNN.
VIDEO AFFILIATE NETWORK (VAN)
STN was invited to partner with CNN, the world’s digital news video leader, in a reciprocal agreement and join its one-stop digital video syndication platform that is built with newsrooms and digital news publishers in mind. The platform leads with what’s most important to its partners: great content by trusted news publishers.  CNN Newsource’s Video Affiliate Network (VAN) is a powerful digital video syndication network focused exclusively on quality news and lifestyle video from CNN and its trusted affiliates. The CNN advantage for STN is enormous as we have an opportunity to combine our in-house journalism efforts with CNNs unparalleled footprint.  
With access to the largest news gathering footprint in the market, CNN has 1,000+ news partners across broadcast, radio, newspaper and digital. Their regional news gathering team brings in more regional news than any other network, often by 3 or 4 times. With 36 domestic and international editorial operations, CNN Newsource is the industry’s most powerful newsgathering resource and North America’s most widely-distributed syndicated news service.
CNN Newsource will enable STN to specifically select and focus on their security niche content as a supplement to our own journalism and broadcasting staff.  With 24-hour digital distribution and eleven live digital satellite channels to create a compelling STN Newscast, collaborate on stories as they develop, and gather news that matters to our collective audience.  This afford STN premium reach on its platform, while profiting from its advertising revenue share model, powerful video content, and flexible technology.
HOW IT WORKS
CNN Newsource Digital, an affordable, end-to-end solution built for digital news publishers. CNN Newsource curates content from CNN, local affiliates and select content partners. CNN Newsource sells advertising against this video inventory and shares revenue with participating affiliates. The more VAN video published, the more revenue earned. 
VAN is available exclusively for CNN Newsource affiliates and select distribution partners. VAN video is continuously updated and curated with content that cover the big stories each day across news, lifestyle and entertainment. VAN affiliates generate revenue by publishing VAN video across their website (pre-sold by CNN Newsource) as well as distributing their own video content through the VAN platform. VAN’s flexible video player and technology platform offers a variety of options for publishing, distribution and content management. Affiliates also have access to Newsource expertise on best practices for optimal performance and monetization.

As this opportunity relates to security business news, and financial market coverage, STN can provide niche programming coverage to an industry long overdue.  As an example, the market size of the security services industry alone in the United States has increased steadily since 2011, reaching a value of approximately 49.2 billion U.S. dollars in 2020. Despite the economic effects of the coronavirus (COVID-19), the industry is expected to continually increase by 0.2 percent in 2021 (Published by Statista Research Department, Mar 30, 2021).  On a global scale, the cyber security market size was valued at USD 156.5 billion in 2019 and is expected to expand at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.0% from 2020 to 2027(Grand View Research).  
While growth is significant, the market, however, is becoming saturated, raising  marketability concerns, which drive increasing cost in marketing campaigns.  We, however, see this as a significant opportunity to provide visibility to important business stories, as the security industry is constantly evolving with new and evolving threats, technology, and business opportunities.  STN will aggregate, deliver, and produce the business stories that are so important to today’s citizens, while earning/sharing revenue.

SOCIALIVE multi-year software license
Video Production Requires Time, Money, and Expertise
Socialive makes it refreshingly easy to capture, create, and distribute video across multiple platforms — giving every team the power to connect more authentically with customers and employees. 

Socialive simplifies video content creation, and  because the case studies confirm the cost savings to produce video, STN is also going to take advantage of these cost savings.  Below is an example of how POLITICO saved money and time in its video production.
Staying On Top Of A Fast-Paced News Cycle
To harness the power of the newsroom and equip its audience with impactful information, POLITICO transitioned from live to virtual events. The Events team looked for a video creation platform to help them keep up with a dizzying news cycle. In search of a flexible solution tailored to their video needs, they encountered several problems:
High video production time, cost, and complexity
Inability to integrate with POLITICO’s product and teams
Low production value
Lack of customization
In addition to figuring out how to efficiently package and distribute video content, the team simplified their end-to-end video workflow and scaled video creation with its existing resources. In an era of social distancing, it was also key to land on a solution built for team collaboration.
Best practices, feedback, quality control.  STN journalist would be enabled to capture video in the field, and it appears instantly in a central library for review, refinement, and sharing out.

 

FUTURE API INTEGRATION
Website Development
The STN website Beta is now complete.  With the exceptional growth in the telecommunication sector, news is shared almost instantly, a capability that STN must share. The news website for the current generation requires more features than just posting and sharing the news.
Ongoing website development will give it the technological freedom to rapidly speed up the process of integrating it with an open application programming interface (API), connecting between other computers or between computer programs. It is a type of software interface, offering a service to other pieces of software.  STN will use them for everything, from niche topics to creating the next big general news platform, and connecting its platform to partner networks like Socialive, cVent for webinars, and Wistia to launch STN Radio.
Personnel Salaries
The hiring process begins by identifying a need within your organization. STN has identified the following needs for its organization: 
(1) Virtual Assistant (Part-time) - A virtual assistant is generally self-employed and provides professional administrative, technical, or creative assistance to clients remotely from a home office.
(1) Digital Media Manager (Full-Time) - A digital marketing manager is responsible for developing, implementing and managing marketing campaigns that promote a company and its products and/or services. He or she plays a major role in enhancing brand awareness within the digital space as well as driving website traffic and acquiring leads/customers.
(2) Journalist  (Part-Time) - An individual trained to collect/gather information in form of text, audio or pictures, processes them to a news-worth form and disseminates it to the public.
(1) TV/Radio Broadcasters (Part-Time) - Broadcast journalists research, investigate and present news and current affairs content for television, radio and the internet.
PRODUCTION
STN Studio
Building an in-house video studio can be a very expensive endeavor.  While the evidence is clear that a virtual in-home studio did work initially for the STN Beta, it's no longer sustainable as a primary production studio.  Additionally, while renting studio time is a short-term solution, our long-term goal serves the growth and talent advantage of the employment base in Arizona.  Maricopa County is in the Phoenix metropolitan area. The area boasts major employers such as Axon, Norton Lifelock, Amazon, KPMG, Securitas, the City of Phoenix, and several financial companies including American Express, Bank of America and Wells Fargo.
It's home to the Center of the Future of War at Arizona State University, Johnson Controls, and  several local businesses ranging from mom-and-pop country stores to well-known national retailers, giving the city a true Hometown, USA feel. This is especially important for STN as it will strive to become a part of the employment base of opportunities in the Phoenix metro, which has a population of nearly five million people.
In these conditions, its clear to us that the hassle of scheduling a shoot, booking a studio, and traveling to the location was a short-term solution.  STN goal is to own its on-site studio, meaning no setup and teardown time; the space is always ready to use at our convenience. This provides great peace of mind for executives, who often have to go live at a moment’s notice. For the marketing team, this provides a whole new level of creative control.
STN will use a  dedicated video studio to interview executives, broadcast news and radio, stream product demos, webinars, employee addresses, and much more.
While STN specializes in “breaking stories about victims, criminals, justice, security business and financial market news.”  Its content will be in the form of documentaries, specials, security tradeshows, webinars, and RealityTV, Court TV Cases, among other types of productions.  STN currently partners with multiple producers and security related production houses for content and we aim to increase these partnerships, while producing STN content in-house.  Below is an example of our current library.
HAK_MTL - Trailer

SOLDIER's Kiss: A PTSD Documentary - Trailer

DIGITAL DISSIDENTS - Trailer

THE PERFECT VICTIM - Trailer

PEKKA - Trailer

DATALAND - Trailer


PRISON DOGS - Trailer

BLACK AND BLUE

WHAT WE TOLD OUR SONS

BLUDGEON - Trailer


THE COLOR OF YOUR SKIN - Trailer

A MATTER OF BIAS - Trailer

THE ORDINANCE - Trailer


FROM WAR TO WISDOM

 
If STN does not reach its entire budget goal, we will prioritize what funds we receive in the following order.  We would first solidify the CNN VAN partnership, and license the SOCIALIVE software to allow for the production of in-house news.  Thereafter, we would deliver on website development at a slower pace, continuing to plow all profits back into the company for maximum growth.

 
Our Budget:
Priority #1 $21,600 : CNN VAN multi-year license
Priority #2 $18,000 : SOCIALIVE multi-year software license
Priority #3 $116,000: Website Development
Priority #4 $124,800: Personnel Salaries
Priority #5 $360,000: STN Studio
The Impact of Your Support



Your support is critical to fuel our continued existence and growth strategy.
Apart from strategic use of social media as a growth strategy, partnering with platforms like CNN, and the global distribution of news stories that matter, your customer experience is our #1 growth mechanism, and it will be the primary reason for our success.  STN understands the power entrusted with the freedom of the press, and it’s this principle of communication and expression, which should be considered a right to be exercised freely.  At the same time, freedom of the press comes with substantial responsibility.
When peeling back the layers of this responsibility, as we do with each investigative story, getting to the core of a story is what readers seek. Readers want reporters to go beyond the basic elements of the story. STN will regularly take a  critical look at its reporting and make sure it attempts to fully explore all aspects of the story. This might include explaining background information, providing context beyond the facts of the latest update, and taking an investigative approach whenever possible.
STN will address terminology, particularly as it relates to new issues and concerns like cybersecurity, artificial intelligence among so many other newer Internet related Technology fields, which thoroughly require taking a step back and thinking about whether the average reader would have a full understanding of all the terms in a story. This not only applies to journalistic terms and procedures that are part of your everyday vocabulary, but not entirely familiar to your entire audience, but also extends to the industries discussed in your story. To help with this concern, STN will consider breaking down a story into its detail, utilizing more long-form vs soundbite news delivery, accounting for the processes and procedures associated with the story in addition to avoiding industry jargon.
Because readers don’t have an inside look at STNs reporting process, it's unclear to them why STN ended up with certain interviews and not others, who declined to speak, or who did not answer your request for an interview. This is part of a more significant issue where readers often associate this with a perceived imbalance in the reporting. STN will include a variety of voices in the story and/or balance stories with opposing counter stories, perhaps more importantly, to explain why certain voices were chosen and why others were left out or unavailable.
Furthermore, there are so many questions about bias centered on the journalists’ motivations, possible affiliation with the subject of the story, among other overall angles. One way STN will guard against perceived bias is to provide a statement of independence that makes it clear that STN and/or its journalist has no relationship with story sources. STN will also clarify key information about how and why the story was reported. The bottom line, STN Readers will always have questions and there are countless ways STN will go about addressing these concerns. However, as the founder of STN, Dr. James Hall’s mission is that each STN journalist considers Edward R. Murrow in this regard, an American broadcast journalist and war correspondent who gained prominence during World War II.  He delivered live radio broadcasts from Europe for the news division of CBS, and was considered one of journalism’s greatest figures, noting his honesty and integrity in delivering the news.

In 2019, the failure rate of startups was around 90%.  Research concludes 21.5% of startups fail in the first year, 30% in the second year, 50% in the fifth year, and 70% in their 10th year.
According to business owners, reasons for failure include money running out, being in the wrong market, a lack of research, bad partnerships, ineffective marketing, and not being an expert in the industry.
The ways to avoid failing include setting goals, accurate research, loving the work, and not quitting.

story:
ORIGINS OF THE LAOICH - SIZZLE REEL POST PRODUCTION

WHY ARE YOU RUNNING THIS CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN?

After a successful main campaign to raise funds to shoot our 16 minute sizzle reel, 60 second teaser, 10 page comic book, create our opening titles, complete our VFX shots, sound design, music and professional marketing poster we're running this small campaign in order to raise the last amount of money we need to complete our post-production. This will allow us to edit a 3 minute pitch trailer, commission a composer to score it and if we raise enough money we can commission a professional Scottish singer to record a song for our trailer/pitch deck and hire professional musicians to accompany them.

"Origins of the Laoich" is an original YA Scottish TV series following 18 year old Effie Dwyer as she returns to Scotland with her family, only to discover that an ancient magical well, once protected by a champion, is now leaking magic, allowing ancient creatures from The Otherworld to enter our own. Effie must train with Éithne, a Pict Goddess and the last remaining Laoich, to fight these creatures back and save her town. 

GOALS

£500 - we can finish our post production and edit a 2-3 minute trailer from our sizzle reel, as well as hiring a composer to score the trailer.

£1830 - we can hire a Scottish singer and musicians, book a recording studio and record a song to accompany and enhance our trailer and sizzle reel for an international audience.

£2080 - we can hire our video team to shoot a music video for the song and use it in our pitch deck, as well as share this with our backers.

With your help we are able to put together a slick, professional pitch presentation which we can put to the likes of Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, Disney+ and beyond, in the hope that they see the potential in our stories about Scottish folklore, mythology and culture with a kick-ass group of teens looking to save the day whilst navigating their every day lives and figure out their place in the world. 

There will be swords, sorcery, scary monsters and the even scarier reality of growing up and facing your adult responsibilities! 

 
We're also producing 100 copies of a prequel comic to "Origins of the Laoich", written by showrunner Fraser Coull and penned by Scottish artist David Fergusson. 
 

What We Need & What You Get

We're offering a few different perks to help us get to £500 including a signed A4 copy of our final poster, producer credits on our IMDb page (https://www.imdb.com/title/tt12607722/) a thank you video from some of our cast and crew, and an exclusive look at some of our sizzle reel scenes and teasers that will not be made available to the public.

So if you can, please grab a perk and help us in this next exciting chapter of "Origins of the Laoich", and get us a step closer to pitching the series and making it a reality! 

The Impact

We've already been so lucky with our first two crowdfunding campaigns that allowed us to producer a 60 second teaser in lockdown and then a 3 day shoot to film our sizzle reel. This also allowed us to commission a 10 page comic book set in the world of "Origins of the Laoich".

The series so far has support from Debbie Moon (Wolfblood creator and BAFTA winning writer) who is serving as Executive Producer along with an international producer helping us reach contacts and production companies outwith the UK to help give us the best shot possible at getting the show off the ground.

Holly Jack (River City) and Simon Weir (Trainspotting 2) star as Éithne, our Pict Goddess and Laoich and Alasdair Bàn respectively, joining Innes Anderson as Effie Dwyer, Ellen Patterson as her cousin, Avril, Gordon J Millar as Effie's Dad, Gregor, Jamie Stewart as the unfortunate dog walker, Cromwell Forsyth, and Rebecca Turner as The Bean-Nighe.

Strike Fight Company staged our two big fight scenes for our sizzle reel, Gibbet FX created our Bean-Nighe monster makeup, Scare Scotland provided us with support for Rebecca's performance as the Bean-Nighe and Hands On Productions provided us with accurate props and weapons for our shoot. Progressive Broadcast Scotland provided us with equipment to shoot on and these are just a few of the amazing people that helped make our sizzle reel a reality, backing our incredible cast and crew.

This provided work during lockdown for many creatives who were struggling and found themselves with no support during the pandemic. You kept us creative, you kept us optimistic and you kept us going. 

Now we're hoping to do it one more time with our poster campaign. If we hit £500, we can commission an artist to create our poster, then package our teaser trailer, sizzle reel, series bible, pilot script all together and help us pitch our show. 

Risks & Challenges

So far we've ran two IndieGoGo campaigns to get "Origins of the Laoich" off the ground - first we produced a 60 second teaser in lockdown, creating it entirely with visual effects, music, voice over artists and sound effects. We commissioned Scottish artist David Fergusson to create concept art of our monsters and characters as well.

The 2nd, bigger campaign, allowed us to shoot for 3 days and create our 16 minute sizzle reel, we found an international producer to come on board and Wolfblood creator Debbie Moon joined us as Executive Producer, bringing a wealth of experience to the writing team of Fraser Coull and James T Harding. 

We were also able to commission a 10 page comic book, which is currently being written and will be penned by David Fergusson. 

It's a risk running a third campaign but we believe that along with our pilot script, sizzle reel, script bible and now an exciting eye catching poster, we can create an original, dynamic brand that streamers won't be able to say no to! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Tell everybody about the campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! Together we can reach our goal!
story_txt:
ORIGINS OF THE LAOICH - SIZZLE REEL POST PRODUCTION

WHY ARE YOU RUNNING THIS CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN?
After a successful main campaign to raise funds to shoot our 16 minute sizzle reel, 60 second teaser, 10 page comic book, create our opening titles, complete our VFX shots, sound design, music and professional marketing poster we're running this small campaign in order to raise the last amount of money we need to complete our post-production. This will allow us to edit a 3 minute pitch trailer, commission a composer to score it and if we raise enough money we can commission a professional Scottish singer to record a song for our trailer/pitch deck and hire professional musicians to accompany them.
"Origins of the Laoich" is an original YA Scottish TV series following 18 year old Effie Dwyer as she returns to Scotland with her family, only to discover that an ancient magical well, once protected by a champion, is now leaking magic, allowing ancient creatures from The Otherworld to enter our own. Effie must train with Éithne, a Pict Goddess and the last remaining Laoich, to fight these creatures back and save her town. 
GOALS
£500 - we can finish our post production and edit a 2-3 minute trailer from our sizzle reel, as well as hiring a composer to score the trailer.
£1830 - we can hire a Scottish singer and musicians, book a recording studio and record a song to accompany and enhance our trailer and sizzle reel for an international audience.
£2080 - we can hire our video team to shoot a music video for the song and use it in our pitch deck, as well as share this with our backers.

With your help we are able to put together a slick, professional pitch presentation which we can put to the likes of Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, Disney+ and beyond, in the hope that they see the potential in our stories about Scottish folklore, mythology and culture with a kick-ass group of teens looking to save the day whilst navigating their every day lives and figure out their place in the world. 
There will be swords, sorcery, scary monsters and the even scarier reality of growing up and facing your adult responsibilities! 


 
We're also producing 100 copies of a prequel comic to "Origins of the Laoich", written by showrunner Fraser Coull and penned by Scottish artist David Fergusson. 
 

What We Need & What You Get
We're offering a few different perks to help us get to £500 including a signed A4 copy of our final poster, producer credits on our IMDb page (https://www.imdb.com/title/tt12607722/) a thank you video from some of our cast and crew, and an exclusive look at some of our sizzle reel scenes and teasers that will not be made available to the public.
So if you can, please grab a perk and help us in this next exciting chapter of "Origins of the Laoich", and get us a step closer to pitching the series and making it a reality! 


The Impact
We've already been so lucky with our first two crowdfunding campaigns that allowed us to producer a 60 second teaser in lockdown and then a 3 day shoot to film our sizzle reel. This also allowed us to commission a 10 page comic book set in the world of "Origins of the Laoich".
The series so far has support from Debbie Moon (Wolfblood creator and BAFTA winning writer) who is serving as Executive Producer along with an international producer helping us reach contacts and production companies outwith the UK to help give us the best shot possible at getting the show off the ground.
Holly Jack (River City) and Simon Weir (Trainspotting 2) star as Éithne, our Pict Goddess and Laoich and Alasdair Bàn respectively, joining Innes Anderson as Effie Dwyer, Ellen Patterson as her cousin, Avril, Gordon J Millar as Effie's Dad, Gregor, Jamie Stewart as the unfortunate dog walker, Cromwell Forsyth, and Rebecca Turner as The Bean-Nighe.
Strike Fight Company staged our two big fight scenes for our sizzle reel, Gibbet FX created our Bean-Nighe monster makeup, Scare Scotland provided us with support for Rebecca's performance as the Bean-Nighe and Hands On Productions provided us with accurate props and weapons for our shoot. Progressive Broadcast Scotland provided us with equipment to shoot on and these are just a few of the amazing people that helped make our sizzle reel a reality, backing our incredible cast and crew.
This provided work during lockdown for many creatives who were struggling and found themselves with no support during the pandemic. You kept us creative, you kept us optimistic and you kept us going. 
Now we're hoping to do it one more time with our poster campaign. If we hit £500, we can commission an artist to create our poster, then package our teaser trailer, sizzle reel, series bible, pilot script all together and help us pitch our show. 


Risks & Challenges
So far we've ran two IndieGoGo campaigns to get "Origins of the Laoich" off the ground - first we produced a 60 second teaser in lockdown, creating it entirely with visual effects, music, voice over artists and sound effects. We commissioned Scottish artist David Fergusson to create concept art of our monsters and characters as well.
The 2nd, bigger campaign, allowed us to shoot for 3 days and create our 16 minute sizzle reel, we found an international producer to come on board and Wolfblood creator Debbie Moon joined us as Executive Producer, bringing a wealth of experience to the writing team of Fraser Coull and James T Harding. 
We were also able to commission a 10 page comic book, which is currently being written and will be penned by David Fergusson. 
It's a risk running a third campaign but we believe that along with our pilot script, sizzle reel, script bible and now an exciting eye catching poster, we can create an original, dynamic brand that streamers won't be able to say no to! 


Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word! Tell everybody about the campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! Together we can reach our goal!

story:
Hi, It's Karla and Michelle, and we are the producer and writer/director (respectively) of Carefronting Inc. Karla has a BFA with a concentration in acting, and is superb at organizing things; producing just comes naturally to her. Michelle has a BFA in film production and has a quirky writing style that lends itself to comedy.

We are running this campaign so we could fully fund the cost of production of Carefronting Inc.; equipment, rentals, editing, crew, post, etc. 

Those who contribute will not only be making a viable pilot come to life, but will be contributing to creating media that is quality, but it is also family friendly. 

Our goal for fundraising is $5,000, which is a  modest goal using friends and family and a ton of favors!

Some perks of donating are Carefronting Inc. memorabilia, Carefronting Inc. hats, we'll take you to dinner, inside scoops on upcoming episodes, we'll walk your dog, take out your grandma, etc. Any contributions over $1,000 gets you a producer credit.

Even if we don't reach our entire goal, all monies will go towards production costs mentioned above.

The world was really sad for a year, and everyone could use a good laugh. This is our first Indiegogo and we hope it goes well.

Our biggest risk would be going over the original time allotted for shooting. It means more money! Mo' money mo' problems! Even if we have to shoot more days than expected, we have a dedicated group of talent, willing to make room in their schedules to make the shoot happen.

Even if you cannot contribute financially, you can always help by getting the word out and please post our Indiegogo on your Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter accounts.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Von-Anise McCoy. I'm the creator and star of Bougie Betty, which is a web-series about a girl from Harlem who believes that a Master's degree and self-help books will make her more refined like her idol, Michelle Obama. However, no matter how much she tries to be pulled-in and sophisticated, when faced with a conflict "the hood" always rears its ugly head. How do you become the better version of yourself, walking around this earth, if crazy people are always creating problems with you?  Nina McKay has been asking herself this question ever since the first time bullies uttered the words "She think, she cute!" 

 We go on a journey with Nina as she strives for the fabulous life, which she believes her education has afforded her, while her sister Kim helps her to recognize that having balance is key. We see that sisterhood, is an important relationship in ones life which provides the check- and-balance. 

 This is my story: as a teen I was bullied, so I was always angry and defensive as a young adult. I saw myself in the characters on reality tv shows, who always lashed out verbally or physical.  

What We Need & What You Get

We'll need $27,476 to complete Season 1 of Bougie Betty episodes (2-5) 

  • Pre-production Cost: (permit and location cost to shot in New York City) = $5,600
  • Production Cost: (Cast, Crew, rental equipment, food) = $13,340
  • Post Production Cost: (editing, sound and color correction) = $8,536

The Impact

We want to pay everyone for working on this passion project. We even got an 'Independent Spirit Award' winning director, Kiara C. Jones to director the rest of the Season 1, so you know that it will be great. While telling a story which holds up a mirror to society today, so people can see their behavior and hopefully, start think before they act-out. While making them laugh in the process! 

Other Ways You Can Help

IF you can't contribute,  that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Bougie Betty and repost, repost, repost.
  • And use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

  • Executive Producer, Mateo Ferro, is an up and coming actor who has been seen in Lin-Manuel Miranda's In the Heights at the Kennedy Center alongside of Vanessa Hudgens, Anthony Ramos, and more. He has recently been featured in the first season of NBC's number one new drama, Manifest. Mateo is currently filming feature film Bars which is set for a release in theaters late 2019. He will be seen in NYC's Tony-Honored Encore's Working the Musical alongside of Oscar Winner Helen Hunt, Tony Nominee and Hamilton's Christopher Jackson, and more late June 2019.
  • Creator and Director, Sebastian Ferro, is the Creative Director of the Art Production Company, N.A.B. Arts. He created JUXTAPOZED: Web-Series and is set to Direct it as well. Sebastian has made and been involved with movies internationally. He filmed two movies in South America which have been seen in high-profile international film festivals. He then wrote and directed his first short film Co-Directed which he received outstanding reviews for and the film has racked up nearly a thousand views. N.A.B. Arts Youtube Channel has gathered up over 35 thousand views. He was recently involved in a New York University thesis film which was filmed in the D.M.V. and is set to be involved in the film festival circuit.  
  • We began conversations for this project months ago. While Mateo was filming his Feature Film in NY and Sebastian was filming in the DMV (DC, Maryland, Virginia), they got together and began to develop the series and put serious thought in the series's future.
  • We need contributors to help bring JUXTAPOZED to your screens. We need help with the budget to make sure the quality of this piece is right and will help us bring it to the distributors that have already been in talks with Sebastian and Mateo. We will have this series available on all platforms with your help!

CAST ANNOUNCMENT

Broadway Hamilton's Terrance Spencer will lead Juxtapozed as Marx.

-Kee Coley will Co-Star alongside of the Hamilton Star as #21073

-Christin Wright (Professional Actress in DMV) will Guest Star as The General

-Nick Gill ( Featured in, Nashville CMT, Netflix's Trailer Park Boys) will Guest Star as The Commander

-David Kimmleman (Professional Theatre/Film Actor in DMV) will Guest Star as The Homeless Person 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • For JUXTAPOZED to be able to be shown to the world we need some help from you. We want to gather up as much as possible through crowd funding and are estimating the need to be around 2,000$. Executive Producer, Mateo Ferro, is putting in a major part of the budget and Production Company, N.A.B. Arts, is also putting in a great part in the budget as well. But we want everyone involved in making this right and bringing it to the world!
  • Contributors will be receiving EXCLUSIVE perks such as an early viewing to the pilot of the series, free tickets to exclusive premiere party, meeting with Mateo and Sebastian, involvement in the film/credits, and much much more!
  • Regardless of if the 2,000$ goal isn't met, we will use every penny to make sure it is put to good use to getting this series to you. NO MATTER WHAT THE SERIES WILL BE MADE AND RELEASED.

The Impact

  • JUXTAPOZED is all about the inner struggles of an oppressed society in an alternate world. We can't wait to blow your mind and have you hooked!
  • Mateo and Sebastian have reached thousands already and have followers who are ready to see the series. IG: @mateoferrofficial @nabarts.co
  • A reflection on a world where wrong and right have been lost. We want all and all to see this and appreciate the magic.
  • Sebastian and Mateo are seeking talent from the area they grew up in and want to shine light in the DMV (DC, Maryland, Virginia) community.

Risks & Challenges

  • With every new project there is always a chance of failure, but not in their minds. Mateo and Sebatian's are using their experiences and knowledge from the industry to make sure this project is successful.
  • Trust us, and the process, and we won't let you down.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, there are PLENTY of other ways you can contribute! Please feel free to share the link to this indiegogo on ALL social media's. FOLLOW Mateo Ferro and Sebastian Ferro on all social media's and post the poster everywhere! There's an OPEN CALL for actors and crew, so take your shot! All info on @nabarts.co instagram! Be involved in this series. JUXTAPOZED COMING SOON.

story:
GIABW - My Truth

As 2020, was in full effect, I found myself leaning into my spirituality more than ever before. My name is Chaz Shermil Hodges and like most of America, I found myself at an extreme low during the pandemic. The isolation, race wars, and fractured justice system had me in a tizzy. Not to mention, the constant mental battles from seeing constant brutality bestowed upon black & brown bodies. 

I cried.

I contemplated suicide. 

I died.

God is a Black Woman is a public mourning of who and what we have been told we need to be as black women in American society. It is also a rebirth of every beautiful thing we have ever been. My wish is for you to support this story because it's one that we have been screaming to tell and yet, somehow no one ever hears. I made this with my friends. I made this with my God.  I made it as a peace-offering to my spirit,  in hopes that it would gently touch yours. 

 

Where is the Money Going?

Your love donations will help to cover expenses for permits, locations, costuming, hair & makeup, craft services, and paying crew. Also, for the short-film submissions! 

Trust me. A lot goes a long way. If you have $10 to spare, that's more than we had before and we are grateful for it all.

 

 

The Impact

"A Black Woman is what happens when the Sun & the Earth makes love."

This is going to be the way in which the magnificence of our beauty is captured throughout the film. The aesthetic appeal of this is the truth in ourselves. The real the raw.

Sure, this sounds heady but the reality is. WE ARE ENOUGH.

Malcolm X has a famous quote, "The most disrespected person in America is the black woman.
The most unprotected person in America is the black woman. The most neglected person in America is the black woman."

This is me changing the narrative. This is taking the person that has previously been regarded as the bottom of the totem pole and reimagining them as GOD. Not much exists for young black girls in this realm. Also, my peers of different colors will come to know and understand the hearts of black women that surround them daily. It's the uncomfortable conversation that no one wants to have, but are immensely better for it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can't contribute, doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share, Share, Share, Share, Share!!!

In the age of social media, the biggest help you can give is aggressive promotion. Please share and make us as known as possible. A post, a like, a comment, a follow, a story - it goes such a long way!

story:
BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY

WOMEN ARE FUNNY. So. Freaking. Funny. And there are so many of us! So why do we keep seeing and hearing from the same handful of women over and over again?... Opportunity, Opportunity, OPPORTUNITY! (That last one I hope you said out loud in Oprah's voice)

  • I'm a writer/ actress/ director who is completely inspired by all my incredibly talented female friends. We are all unique and beautiful, with stories and voices that, frankly, aren't being heard.
  • I'm also a person. Which means I have "the Facebook", and have noticed over the last few years it becoming more and more a marketplace to sell, well, EVERYTHING!
  • Soooooo I decided to write what I know, what perhaps EVERYONE who's on Facebook knows. That Multi Level Marketing is a great way to make money! But what if it's also an incredible way showcase talented women?? What if Social Media is the next frontier not just in selling your wares, but in selling yourself. Wait, not like that, like... like... your comedy self. In a LIVE scripted format????? 
  • And YOU can be a part of providing THAT opportunity for HILARIOUS WOMEN, whilst bringing some serious laughter LIVE onto your Facebook Feed. It's basically a Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich of joy!

What We Need

Here's the thing, I can't do this alone (and believe me, I've tried)!!  I just humbly realized, it's better when you're honest with yourself and others and say "WE ALL NEED TO COME TOGETHER TO CREATE MORE REPRESENTATION !!"

  • Did you know BRIDESMAIDS' budget was 32.5 million dollars?!
  • Did you know ours is just 2,500 smackeroos? That may seem miniscule to a major studio, but to someone who is funding it all on their own, it's basically trying to come up with Scrooge McDuck's gold coin bank vault!
  • But what shall Scrooge's bank vault pay for you ask?! Welp -- Theater Rental, Rehearsal Space, Film Equipment, Props, Costumes and, of course, FOOD. That's right, I said food. Our actors are working on this project out of love (i.e. unpaid), AND because of this, we'd LOVE to make sure there is food for them during the shoot/ performance! It's the little things, like Peanut M&M's that really show you care, unless they have a nut allergy. I should check on that...

WHAT YOU GET!

Oh besides the incredible feeling in your heart that you have allowed joy to spread across the world? Oh you want stuff, like things, experiences, fulfillment... I got you!

Take a look at our PERKS, yo ---------------------> Seriously, they're just to the right on the screen!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, listen, if anyone understands not having the funds, this sometimes struggling actress does. Money may make the world go round (and this production happen) but LOVE for it makes to a success!!

  • (THIS IS HUGE) Like and follow along at Facebook.com/OliviaClarkSNKOil
  • Join us LIVE Thursday, August 10th at 7:30pm PST on that same FBook page for all the laughs of BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY 
  • Oh and Indiegogo wants me to remind you to use the Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign. Ding! 

Ok, that's it!

Love, (seriously so much love)
Kiersten
story_txt:
BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY
WOMEN ARE FUNNY. So. Freaking. Funny. And there are so many of us! So why do we keep seeing and hearing from the same handful of women over and over again?... Opportunity, Opportunity, OPPORTUNITY! (That last one I hope you said out loud in Oprah's voice)

I'm a writer/ actress/ director who is completely inspired by all my incredibly talented female friends. We are all unique and beautiful, with stories and voices that, frankly, aren't being heard.
I'm also a person. Which means I have "the Facebook", and have noticed over the last few years it becoming more and more a marketplace to sell, well, EVERYTHING!
Soooooo I decided to write what I know, what perhaps EVERYONE who's on Facebook knows. That Multi Level Marketing is a great way to make money! But what if it's also an incredible way showcase talented women?? What if Social Media is the next frontier not just in selling your wares, but in selling yourself. Wait, not like that, like... like... your comedy self. In a LIVE scripted format????? 
And YOU can be a part of providing THAT opportunity for HILARIOUS WOMEN, whilst bringing some serious laughter LIVE onto your Facebook Feed. It's basically a Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich of joy!


What We Need
Here's the thing, I can't do this alone (and believe me, I've tried)!!  I just humbly realized, it's better when you're honest with yourself and others and say "WE ALL NEED TO COME TOGETHER TO CREATE MORE REPRESENTATION !!"

Did you know BRIDESMAIDS' budget was 32.5 million dollars?!
Did you know ours is just 2,500 smackeroos? That may seem miniscule to a major studio, but to someone who is funding it all on their own, it's basically trying to come up with Scrooge McDuck's gold coin bank vault!
But what shall Scrooge's bank vault pay for you ask?! Welp -- Theater Rental, Rehearsal Space, Film Equipment, Props, Costumes and, of course, FOOD. That's right, I said food. Our actors are working on this project out of love (i.e. unpaid), AND because of this, we'd LOVE to make sure there is food for them during the shoot/ performance! It's the little things, like Peanut M&M's that really show you care, unless they have a nut allergy. I should check on that...


WHAT YOU GET!
Oh besides the incredible feeling in your heart that you have allowed joy to spread across the world? Oh you want stuff, like things, experiences, fulfillment... I got you!
Take a look at our PERKS, yo ---------------------> Seriously, they're just to the right on the screen!

story:
Join the crew!

Hello, we are the Film and Television department at the Orange County School of the Arts. In our pursuit to gain more knowledge about video production and storytelling, we decide to create a  three-episode web series. The Clue Crew is about a group of high school students who love to solve mysteries in the town of Waffleville. However, their skills are put to the test when one of their friends gets kidnapped...again! We need your support make our vision come to life!

What you can do.

In order to bring our vision to life, we need to raise at least $1,000 for the following resources:

Craft Services- Let's face it, filming takes a lot of energy and time. We are planning on filming for 6 days and Peanut-butter and Jelly sandwiches won't cut it. So we need funding to feed our devoted actors and crew members for the long filming days to come. ( Approx. $800)

Production and Design- We have a talented team of students to create beautiful sets and costumes for the series. They have donated everything they have to create the world of our story but they need the materials to do so. ( Approx. $200)

The Impact

By helping our group of students not only will you be able to provide the necessary materials to create a professional production but you will also contribute to the student's education in video production and working together as a team. 

The web series will premiere on the big screen at Chapman University and the seats will be full of proud parents and family members waiting to witness a phenomenal web series that their child created. 

Other ways you can help

If you are unable to aid us financially you can still help us!

  • First of all, SPREAD THE WORD! Follow us on social media and make sure to share our posts. 
  • We are building a set for the Clue Crews hangout. So if you have any props( i.e. cool rugs, lava lamps, neon lights, posters etc.) that you would like to donate please send us a picture and let us know!

THANK YOU!
